## strings.Base64Encoded class

Transformation matcher that matches a base64 encoded version of the given string or string matcher

WARNING: Since many strings are accidentally decodable as base64, this matcher is best combined with a more restrictive string matcher (eg `StringifiedJson`<!-- -->).

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class Base64Encoded extends AnyMatcher
```

**Extends:** [AnyMatcher](./test-equivalence-matchers.base.anymatcher.md)

| [(constructor)(child)](./test-equivalence-matchers.strings.base64encoded._constructor_.md) |           | WARNING: Since many strings are accidentally decodable as base64, this matcher is best combined with a more restrictive string matcher (eg <code>StringifiedJson</code>). |
